mapper.insert: INSERT INTO class_schedule(schedule_id, semester, course_id, teacher_id, classroom, capacity, class_time) VALUES (#{scheduleId}, #{semester}, #{courseId}, #{teacherId}, #{classroom}, #{capacity}, #{classTime});
mapper.select: SELECT cs.schedule_id, cs.course_id, c.course_name, c.credit, c.exam_weight, cs.teacher_id, cs.class_time, cs.classroom, cs.capacity, e.exam_time, e.exam_place FROM class_schedule cs JOIN course c ON c.course_id = cs.course_id LEFT JOIN exam e ON e.schedule_id = cs.schedule_id WHERE teacher_id = #{teacherId} AND cs.status = '审核通过';
mapper.update: UPDATE class_schedule SET semester = #{semester}, course_id = #{courseId}, teacher_id = #{teacherId}, classroom = #{classroom}, capacity = #{capacity}, class_time = #{classTime}, status = #{status} WHERE schedule_id = #{scheduleId}
